vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Edomites living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.5;
son of: Esau (H6215) and Oholibamah (H0173);
brother of: Jeush (H3266) and Korah (H7141);
half-brother of: Eliphaz (H0464) and Reuel (H7467)
§ Jaalam = "concealed"
an Edomite, descendant of Esau
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
雅蘭 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "隱藏"
以東人, 以掃的後裔
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
雅兰 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "隐藏"
以东人, 以扫的后裔
